guide.introduction: If you're like me, you probably have a pile of paint chips sitting around the house left over from your last big paint job. I always grab extra colors because I never know what might strike my fancy when it comes to deciding on a room color. Well, here's an easy way to repurpose those paint chips into a tear-away notepad that can be used to jot down your daily to-do lists.
guide.introduction_rendered:
If you're like me, you probably have a pile of paint chips sitting around the house left over from your last big paint job. I always grab extra colors because I never know what might strike my fancy when it comes to deciding on a room color. Well, here's an easy way to repurpose those paint chips into a tear-away notepad that can be used to jot down your daily to-do lists.

Tools
  • Paintbrush
  • Painter's tape
  • bookbinding adhesive
  • clothespins or clamps
  • paint chips
guide.summary: Use leftover paint chips to create a colorful notepad.
guide.title: Paint Chip Notepad
